title: SATURN (Android Wear)
summary: SATURN is the space game for Android Wear! How long can you survive?
description: Saturn is a very dangerous planet! You will need to fly through the asteroid belt and avoid waves of asteroids! How long can you survive?GAME REVIEW• "Fun app for android wear."GAME DESCRIPTION• Tap to change spaceship direction• Avoid the asteroids!• Support square and round screen watches.If you like this game, please check out the following Android Wear apps!• SATURN 3D: Your favourite game - now in 3D!• Space War: Best arcade game for Android Wear!• GALAXIA: Galaxian for Android Wear.• Invaders: Space Invaders for Android Wear.• Invaders Watch: Space Invaders theme watch faces.
descriptionHTML:
Saturn is a very dangerous planet! You will need to fly through the asteroid belt and avoid waves of asteroids! How long can you survive?

GAME REVIEW
• "Fun app for android wear."

GAME DESCRIPTION
• Tap to change spaceship direction
• Avoid the asteroids!
• Support square and round screen watches.


If you like this game, please check out the following Android Wear apps!
• SATURN 3D: Your favourite game - now in 3D!
• Space War: Best arcade game for Android Wear!
• GALAXIA: Galaxian for Android Wear.
• Invaders: Space Invaders for Android Wear.
• Invaders Watch: Space Invaders theme watch faces.
comments: Simple, but fun. There's really not much to this game and let's face it, if you're going to do some gaming, it's probably not going to be on your "smart" watch... But, if you're dead-set on playing "smart" watch games, then Saturn is a great starting point.
Great App Fun app for android wear, works nicely on the LG G Watch R's round display. High score feature would be nice in an update.
